original: Bhū sattāyaṃ paca pāke gamusappa gatimhi (ca);
analyzed: bhū sattāyam paca pāke gatimhi ca
corrected: bhū sattāyam paca pāke gamu sappa gatimhi ca

original: 4. Vava, lokanavittisu cakkhavutimhi (tu) rukkha (ca) khe thirahiṃsakhaṇe niya, mo’panayiṭṭhi
analyzed: lokana vittisu cakkha vutimhi tu ca khe thira hiṃsa khaṇe
corrected: Vava lokana vittisu cakkha vutimhi tu rukkha ca khe thira hiṃsa khaṇe niya mo panayiṭṭhi

original: vatādisa muṇḍisu dikkha (’tha) kakkha-kakhā hasane tura, hiṃsanavuddhigatīsu (hi)
analyzed: muṇḍisu hasane tura hiṃsana vuddhi gatīsu hi
corrected: vatādisa muṇḍisu dikkha atha kakkha kakhā hasane tura hiṃsana vuddhi gatīsu hi

original: dakkha’danamhi (tu) jakkha (ca) bhakkha (matā) ana, jāladukhesu (tu) dikkha (ca)
analyzed: tu jakkha ca bhakkha matā ana jāla dukhesu tu dikkha ca
corrected: dakkha danamhi tu jakkha ca bhakkha matā ana jāla dukhesu tu dikkha ca

original: (siyā’pi) bhikkha yāvaladdhya’laddhisū (pi) vakkha rosasaṃhatesu mokkha muttiyaṃ
analyzed: siyā api bhikkha pi vakkha rosa saṃhatesu mokkha muttiyam
corrected: siyā api bhikkha yāvaladdhya aladdhi su pi vakkha rosa saṃhatesu mokkha muttiyam

original: Paca yāte kaci-vacca dittiyaṃ maci dhāraṇe.
analyzed: paca yāte dittiyam maci dhāraṇe
corrected: paca yāte kaci-vacca dittiyam maci dhāraṇe

original: Majja saṃsuddhiyaṃ lajja lajjane tajja tajjane.
analyzed: majja lajja lajjane tajja tajjane
corrected: majja saṃsuddhiyaṃ lajja lajjane tajja tajjane

original: Jhe cintāyujjha ussagge gamane aṭa-paṭa dvayaṃ;
analyzed: jhe ussagge gamane aṭa paṭa dvayam
corrected: jhe cintāyujjha ussagge gamane aṭa paṭa dvayaṃ

analyzed: saṅghāte ciṭut tāse ghaṭī hane
corrected: Jaṭa jhaṭa piṭa saṅghāte ciṭut tāse ghaṭī hane

analyzed: suṭhī kuṭhī dvayam hiṃsana dhāraṇe
corrected: suṭhī kuṭhī dvayaṃ sose pīṭha hiṃsana dhāraṇe

analyzed: sosana pākesu thulattane bhave
corrected: Kaṭha sosana pākesu vaṭha thulattane bhave

analyzed: sose ruṭha luṭha upaghāte ketave
corrected: Kaṭhi sose ruṭha luṭha upaghāte saṭha ketave

analyzed: hiṃsā ayam piḍi saṅghāta ādisu
corrected: Raḍi eraḍi hiṃsā ayam piḍi saṅghāta ādisu

analyzed: atho gādha patiṭṭhāyam ca vuddhiyam
corrected: atho gādha patiṭṭhāyam vuṭhu-edha ca vuddhiyam

analyzed: atha u usūya dosa a vikaraṇe sāya sa ayane
corrected: atha u usūya dosa a vikaraṇe sāya sa ayane

original: Jara jīraṇatthe marapāṇacāge khara sekanāse ghara sevanamhi;
analyzed: jara jīraṇatthe khara seka nāse
corrected: jara jīraṇatthe mara pāṇa cāge khara seka nāse ghara sevanamhi

analyzed: lasa ka nti atthe rasa bhasmi karaṇe ca api
corrected: lasa ka nti atthe rasa assāde puna bhasa bhasmi karaṇe ca api

analyzed: su hiṃsā kula sandhāna yātrā ādīsu su
corrected: su hiṃsā kula sandhāna yātrā ādīsu su passave

original: 116. Sā’ssāde sā’vasāne (ca) sā tanūkaraṇe (pi ca) hā cāge muha vecitte naha sajjanabandhane naha soce pihicchāyaṃ siniha-saniha pītiyaṃ.
analyzed: sa āssāde sa avasāne ca sā tanūkaraṇe ca ca hā cāge naha sat jana bandhane naha soce
corrected: sa āssāde sa avasāne ca sā tanūkaraṇe pi ca hā cāge muha vecitte naha sat jana bandhane naha soce pihi chāyaṃ siniha saniha pītiyaṃ

analyzed: chada apavāraṇe vamane chandaḥ icchayam
corrected: chadā apavāraṇe chadda vamane chanda icchayaṃ

analyzed: dhātu upasevā ayam vattati mecur ādayaḥ
corrected: dhātu upasevā ayam vattati me cur ādayaḥ laḷa
